name: this show will blind you!
reviewBody: This show is crap I mean anyone who even considers enjoying this show has no taste for entertainment and doesn't know bad acting if it came up to them and introduced it self! Emma Robers is a horrible untalented actress and no one would know what the heck she was if it wasn't for her famous aunt. She is without doubt a fag actress no one will remember who she is after 2 years just like Hillary duff and Lindsay Lohan Emma is just going to be in the long list of untalented and bad actresses!! If you don't believe me then wait a year and see if her show is still on!! P.S. if u enjoy this show please please call a acting school and see what the real art of acting is about!
